contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 23, 2013 D Scottish Challenge Shield
Scottish Challenge Shield 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Scottish BBA Festival of Brass scottish-challenge-shield
3 Separate Adjudicator Boxes (Test Piece)
Perth Concert Hall, Perth, Perth & Kinross, Scotland, UK Adj A = Leigh Baker Adj B = Simone Rebello Adj C = John Boax
Invitations sent to top four placed bands in Section 1 at the 2013 Scottish Championships and top three placed bands in Section 2.
Highest placed 1st Section Band: Newtongrange Highest placed 2nd Section Band: Unison Kinneil
Oct. 2, 2013, 3:06 p.m. Nov. 25, 2013, 11:11 p.m.
1 Newtongrange Band Lee Skipsey Corpus Christi
2 Coalburn Silver Band Gareth Bowman A London Overture
3 Unison Kinneil Band Craig Anderson Partita [Sparke]
4 Johnstone Band Paul Kiernan The Year of the Dragon
5 Annan Town (Magnox North) David Shanks Music for the Common Man
Withdrawn Newmilns and Galston Band Nigel Boddice
Withdrawn Bathgate Band Andy Shaw
